CustomField.description: Flag indicating the method for populating the Employees field. 0 = the number of employees is an actual verified count. 1 = the number of employees is an estimated count using modeling or additional research techniques.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Flag indicating the method for populating the Employees field. 0 = the number of employees is an actual verified count. 1 = the number of employees is an estimated count using modeling or additional research techniques.
CustomField.label: Employee Derivation Flag
